title: Hanes Sport Performance Long Sleeve T-Shirt, Performance Athletic Shirt, 2-Pack, 40+ UPF Protection
description: HANES SPORT - Apparel that builds on our comfort heritage with innovative technologies to give you the looks that fit your life, your sport, and your style.
TWICE AS NICE - Stock up with a single-color pack of two long sleeve performance tees.
TEE WITH AN EDGE - Performance features give this lightweight men's training t-shirt the competitive edge you need.
QUICK DRYING - Cool DRI technology helps dry the fabric faster for maximum comfort.
SUN PROTECTION - Cool DRI tees boast a UPF rating of 40+ for protection against harmful ultraviolet rays.
MOISTURE WICKING - Cool Comfort fabric wicks away sweat to help keep you cool.

PERFORMANCE. STYLE. COMFORT.Light as a feather and loaded with superior performance features, this Hanes Sport™ men's long sleeve t-shirt builds on our comfort heritage with a style that fits your life and sport. Crafted from an interlock jersey knit fabric, it features a contemporary fit with a ribbed, lay-flat collar - but it's the technology that sets this men's performance tee apart. Cool DRI™ technology helps dry fabric faster, while the shirt boasts a UPF rating of 40+ for protection against harmful UV rays. Thanks to moisture-wicking fabric and advanced odor-protection technology, you'll stay cool and fresh no matter how hard you go. Available in a variety of assorted colors, including neon brights for enhanced visibility when you need it. Stock up with this single-color pack of two, so you can always keep a clean Hanes shirt on hand.
